column5: Schools out, so I finally get to spend my Mondays off to fish with my daughter! First trip, we headed out to Scugog with a bucket of worms and a loyal friend.  After a frustrating 30 minutes of fish peeling worms off of hooks, and me realizing I left the smaller hook at home, I decided break into my fly box, tied a black wooley bugger under the float, and tipped with a very small piece of worm, the results were immediate success.  The first fish had the pups attention as he wondered what the heck just came out of his giant swimming pool, and why was it moving...   From there, my daughter stole the show!     After getting over her initial fear, she made some new 'friends'      And to top off the day, she pulled this beauty out the pond! her first one and hopefully many more!     Definitely not a bad way to spend a morning!
I can't think of a better way to spend the morning.
I can't think of a better way to spend the morning.  X2 and thx for sharing. Taking the little ones is the best.
Quite the lil angler she is!  Smile on her face says it all!
she loves fishing, and can't wait to go again.  I've got an ultralight noodle rod loaded with 4lb test, makes those small fish feel bigger and puts a little more excitement into the catch
That is what it,s all about.  Great job DAD
I can't think of a better way to spend the morning. x2
Nice, enjoy your time together. They grow up fast!
That is what it,s all about.  Great job DAD stole the words I was going to say too.
Nice pictures great job Dad looks like a new angler in the family .
That's beautiful. Congrats on a great day.
